changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE menu_content( menu_id int NOT NULL, feed_id int NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (menu_id ,feed_id), CONSTRAINT menu_content_menu_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (menu_id) REFERENCES menu (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT menu_content_feed_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (feed_id) REFERENCES feed (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE, feed_amount int NOT NULL CHECK(feed_amount > 0) );
